description.value:
You add your Charisma bonus (if any) to your attack rolls and adds your paladin level to all damage rolls made against a good target of your smite. If the target of smite good is an outsider with the good subtype, an good-aligned dragon, or an cleric or paladin, the bonus to damage on the first successful attack increases to 2 points of damage per paladin level you possess. Regardless of the target, smite good attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess.

In addition, while smite good is in effect, you gain a deflection bonus equal to your Charisma modifier (if any) to your AC against attacks made by the target of the smite.

Usage: Set the level of this buff to the paladin level of Smite Good.
